item.title: Report X-2025050179
item.description:
Report X-2025050179

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-02T15:18:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-22
  • City: PETALUMA
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER NOTIFIED OF SPILL IN DOOR 8. SPOKE TO UNLOADER TOLD IT WAS A HAZARDOUS MATERIAL THAT WAS CAUSING IRRITATION TO NASAL PASSAGES. REMOVED 5 PART AND REFERENCED DECISION TREE AND EMERGENCY GUIDE. RESPONDER CALLED BASE, FOLLOWED CHAIN OF COMMAND. OUTSIDE RESPONDER WAS DISPATCHED TO CLEAN SPILL. ALL SPILLED MATERIAL PUT IN POLY DRUM FOR DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2025041899
item.description:
Report X-2025041899

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-01T01:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-28
  • City: ONTARIO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED AN INNER BOX WITH FLAMMABLE GAS DANGEROUS GOODS MARKINGS AND LABELS. INSIDE THIS INNER BOX IS TWENTY POUND CYLINDER OF FLAMMABLE GAS CONTENTS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS DROPPED OFF IN TEXAS USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 44XV29, ALFA CANTOR, 2075 E FM 1187, ALEDO TX 76008-4625.

item.title: Report E-2025040572
item.description:
Report E-2025040572

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-01T01:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-25
  • City: ANAHEIM
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 25, 2025, one (1) 330-gallon tote of UN2735 was punctured and released approximately five (5) gallons of product to the trailer interior and loading dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental Services (GES) to remediate the site. The crew transferred the product to a new tote, and utilized absorbents, hand tools, and neutralizing agent to remediate the site. All impacted material was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum.

item.title: Report X-2025041778
item.description:
Report X-2025041778

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-01T01:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-15
  • City: ALISO VIEJO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO OF DELAWARE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING INVOICE INSPECTION OF TWO AIR PACKAGES FROM USA TO CANADA, FRAGRANCE SET WAS INDICATED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED A PERFUME COLLECTION CONTAINING EIGHT X 0.25 FL OZ BOTTLES OF FLAMMABLE PERFUME. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER 1Z9V06546622360761 CONTAINS A PERFUME COLLECTION CONTAINING THREE X 0.5 FL OZ BOTTLES OF FLAMMABLE PERFUME. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
